ModInfo.Name: RimWorld AI Enhanced Gameplay Mod
ModInfo.Description: This mod introduces sophisticated artificial intelligence to RimWorld, enhancing gameplay dynamics and deepening colonist interactions. Features include advanced decision-making, adaptive learning algorithms, and improved health management systems, all aimed at creating a more immersive and responsive game environment. The mod is structured in a modular way, allowing for easy expansion and improved performance.
ModInfo.Author: Kilo.Musician

Component.Name: AI Core
Component.Description: Central hub for AI decision-making, integrating several AI techniques to manage NPC behavior and game events effectively.

Component.Name: Learning Algorithms
Component.Description: Employs machine learning and natural language processing to enable NPCs to learn from interactions and adapt their responses over time.

Component.Name: Health Management
Component.Description: Enhances the health system with AI-driven diagnostics and treatments, offering more realistic and dynamic health scenarios for NPCs.

Component.Name: User Interface
Component.Description: Improves player interaction with AI elements through a redesigned UI, facilitating better control and visualization of AI functions.

Dependency.Name: Harmony
Dependency.Description: Enables the patching of methods for mod compatibility and runtime modification.

Dependency.Name: HugsLib
Dependency.Description: Acts as a bridge for mod functionality, offering tools and services essential for mod interoperability.
